es.additionalInfo: Movistar+ and DAZN share broadcasting rights in Spain.

gb.additionalInfo: LaLigaTV broadcasts all matches. Some matches also available on Premier Sports and Amazon Prime.

us.additionalInfo: ESPN holds exclusive rights. Most matches on ESPN+, select matches on ABC, ESPN, or ESPN2.

ca.additionalInfo: TSN and RDS share broadcasting rights in Canada.

au.additionalInfo: beIN Sports holds rights, also available through Kayo Sports streaming.

in.additionalInfo: Viacom18 holds rights, matches streamed for free on JioCinema.

fr.additionalInfo: beIN Sports holds exclusive rights to La Liga matches in France.

de.additionalInfo: DAZN holds exclusive rights to La Liga matches in Germany.

it.additionalInfo: DAZN holds exclusive rights to La Liga matches in Italy.

br.additionalInfo: ESPN Brasil broadcasts select matches on TV. All matches available on Star+ streaming.

mx.additionalInfo: Sky Sports holds rights to broadcast La Liga matches in Mexico.

nl.cost: Included in Ziggo subscription or €14.95/month for Ziggo Sport Totaal
nl.additionalInfo: Ziggo Sport holds rights to La Liga matches in the Netherlands.

se.cost: SEK 299/month for C More All Sport
se.additionalInfo: C More holds rights to La Liga matches in Sweden.

no.additionalInfo: TV2 holds rights to La Liga matches in Norway.

dk.additionalInfo: TV2 holds rights to La Liga matches in Denmark.

mena.additionalInfo: beIN Sports holds rights for the Middle East and North Africa region.

jp.additionalInfo: WOWOW has held rights to La Liga matches in Japan in recent years, but current details may vary.

kr.additionalInfo: beIN Sports has held rights to La Liga matches in South Korea in recent years, but current details may vary.

cn.additionalInfo: iQIYI has held rights to La Liga matches in China in recent years, but current details may vary.

sg.additionalInfo: beIN Sports has held rights to La Liga matches in Singapore in recent years, but current details may vary.

ph.additionalInfo: beIN Sports has held rights to La Liga matches in the Philippines in recent years, but current details may vary.

ru.additionalInfo: Match TV has held rights to La Liga matches in Russia in recent years, but current details may vary.

pl.additionalInfo: Eleven Sports has held rights to La Liga matches in Poland in recent years, but current details may vary.

tr.additionalInfo: beIN Sports has held rights to La Liga matches in Turkey in recent years, but current details may vary.

za.additionalInfo: SuperSport has held rights to La Liga matches in South Africa in recent years, but current details may vary.

th.additionalInfo: beIN Sports has held rights to La Liga matches in Thailand in recent years, but current details may vary.

gr.additionalInfo: COSMOTE TV has held rights to La Liga matches in Greece in recent years, but current details may vary.
